data.message: Lately I've just watched and listened to his work, he left and watched the letters that he made and their songs, too, and obviously this will inspire me a lot and would be honored if you really put this idea to you, in the case it is an idea will still work, the songs, and I will do the letters and send you, hope you enjoy this idea or a rapper relamente showed respect to him today, and the proof has to be remembered
